overview: A normal camping trip becomes a fight for survival for four friends when they encounter a mysterious stranger named Kane (horror legend, Tom Savini). Kane, a government operative is charged with the task of containing a rogue military experiment loose in the wild. Kaneâ€™s primary objective is to capture unsuspecting campers and feed them to the ravenous beast. In the end the survivors are faced with a fight to the death with a vicious monster and the man who controls it.
tagline: In nature, you're either the hunter... or the hunted
title: Vicious
